Dear {!Contact.FirstName},<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
Per my voice mail, I wanted to give you an overview of the 76® Fleet Card. Our FLEET CARD is the perfect tool to help you save time and money when it comes to your vehicle fleet operations.
REAL SAVINGS
· Save up to 5¢ per gallon* every time you fuel at a 76®, Conoco® and Phillips 66® location.
· Save up to 15% off your overall fuel management costs.**
EASE OF USE and ACCEPTANCE
· Enjoy easy online controls so you can set spending limits and monitor driver behavior.
· Enjoy convenient access to over 7400 76®, Conoco® and Phillips 66® locations nationwide. Ask for our Universal Card, and you’ll have acceptance at over 90% of all U.S. fueling sites.
· Best-in-class customer service available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
I will be following up with you next week. In the meantime, you can reach me at {!User.Phone} or via email at {!User.Email}.
I look forward to meeting with you about the needs of your business.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone: {!User.Phone} Email: {!User.Email}
*Rebates are subject to change at any time without prior notice and are not be applicable to aviation fuel, racing fuel, ethanol, E85 and Kerosene. **Actual savings may vary.
